description: 100 comprehensive training entries covering IPC, CrPC, and Constitution with Hindi and English

entries.question: What does IPC Section 302 say?
entries.answer: IPC Section 302 deals with murder. death or life imprisonment
entries.context: IPC Section 302: IPC Section 302 deals with murder. death or life imprisonment
entries.hindi_answer: IPC धारा 302 murder से संबंधित है। death or life imprisonment
